markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Draw](/Feats.aspx?ID=498) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 172 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80) (Level 4), [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91) (Level 4), [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion. You Interact to draw a weapon, then Strike with that weapon.

<title level="2">Quick Draw leads to...</title>
[Subtle Shank](/Feats.aspx?ID=2208)
name: Quick Draw
